text: Carolyn Hsu, Head of Digital | April 02, 2018 Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Brandi Glanville recently took to YouTube to explain why half her mouth doesn ’ t move when she talks. In the 12 - minute video, Glanville reveals that she had suffered third - degree burns from a laser hair removal treatment gone wrong, causing “ nerve damage ” and “ scar tissue, ” and resulting her in inability to “ talk straight. ”'' Everyone wants to know why my top lip doesn't move. You can see it right here. It ’ s a little white circle, ” Glanville says in the video. “ I had laser hair removal on my upper lip, oh gosh, 2009, maybe 2008, and I got a third - degree burn.
